mot.qual: I'm studying English because I work in  public office and it's very important to know another language a part from Italian.
advantages.qual: I think that studying English (on anothel language) is the best way to improve our knowledge and to be ablo to travel and deal with other cultures.
idealfuture.qual: As I said in the first answer, I work in a public office. I have to deal with meny people from different Countries and learning English would be helpful. Maybe, one day, I could reach a higer level.
other.speak.other.L2: French, a little bit of Spanish

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: entrare in un ambito lavorativo nel quale questa lingua sia indispensabile
advantages.qual: approfondire la lingua ed essere in grado di usarla anche ad un livello lavorativo più specializzato
idealfuture.qual: determinante

mot.qual: Principalmente, la prospettiva di poter comunicare con persone da tutto il mondo e poter ampliare anche le possibilità lavorative.
advantages.qual: L' Italiano non è una lingua che al di fuori dell' Italia viene parlata molto, quindi non mi permetterebbe da sola di poter raggiungere certi obbiettivi. Imparare l'Inglese può darmi molto dal punto di vista della versatilità lavorativa.
idealfuture.qual: Ha il ruolo di mezzo attraverso il quale poter trovare lavoro anche in contesti molto diversi dalla mia realtà attuale.

mot.qual: I have always been really passionate about English as a language but I am also really interested in the culture of the English-speaking countries. When I have a convesation in English or I read a book written in English I feel at home. I study English because I want to master this language and to be able to understand or express any kind of concept, idea and feeling.
advantages.qual: Everybody in Italy studies English but learning it at university level will give me the possibility to achieve a level of language skills higher than the most other Italians. Italian as a language is spoken by a minority of people in the World, whereas English is an international language so it is obviously extremely important for me be able to use it. I think mastering English will give me more possibility to find my dream job, even in a foreign country.
idealfuture.qual: I hope English will have a key role in my future, as I would like to move to an English-speaking country and to find a job that would allow me to use my language skills.

mot.qual: For me it's quite natural to think in English. It's a part of me. I love the sounds of this language in fact I often travel abroad to hear people speaking English and to improve  my speaking skills. I also love English litterature and culture. My dream is to use this language as well as my moyjer tongue. That's why I decided to study English at University.
advantages.qual: First of all I think that it will improve my english. I'd like to speak fluently so that everyone would be able to understand me. Nowadays it's very important to learn a language that let you communicate with the rest of the world. In Italy this idea isn't very popular, in fact the number of people with a good level of English is not so high. Schools don't  give enough importance to this point, that's why I decided to contiue my personal studying of English.
idealfuture.qual: I hope that English will be a part of my daily life. I'd like to work in a context which can give the opportunity to travel a lot and to keep in touch with foreign people.

mot.qual: I'm currently studying English because it has always fascinated me and I've always felt like it's the easiest language for me to learn. It's becoming the most spoken language all around the world so by speaking it it'll be easier to communicate.
advantages.qual: I think that being Italian but always being an excellent English speaker will help me to get the job that I want and become the person I dream of being.
idealfuture.qual: I think that it'll be the element of my career that will help me to improve my status.

mot.qual: Vorrei diventare professoressa di letteratura inglese
advantages.qual: A livello universitario si studia la lingua in maniera più approfondita rispetto a come viene imparata e insegnata nelle scuole di grandi inferiore
idealfuture.qual: Sarà la lingua che mi permetterà di lavorare

mot.qual:
I want to be able to comunicate with people from other countries, get to know their culture and their lifestyle. 
I hope that having a good competence in English will help me find a job I will like.
I think English is a beautiful language to learn, and I find English literature very facinaying to study.
I want to expand my horizons.
advantages.qual: Personally, I think that one of the main advantages of knowing English well is being able to comunicate with other people, and I also think that, today, knowing English to an high level is important to get a job.
idealfuture.qual: I see myself speaking English daily, I hope to live my life in an English speaking country.
study.other.L2: I study Russian, I plan to learn Spanish and hopefully also Portuguese

mot.qual: I would like to work abroad and be able to speak to (almost) everyone.
advantages.qual: Nowadays, many people know English. But how many of them know English at a medium-high level? I think university helps me improving my spoken and written English, and becoming an expert of this language.
idealfuture.qual: The future me will speak English to communicate with colleagues, or will teach English to Italian students, or will teach Italian to English speakers, or will translate from and to English language.

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: My main motivation is my family. They expect from me to have a very good level of English so in the future I can become a good teacher of this language and earn money. Also there is no comperison between reading the book in original and the translated one. Those words were selected from that language we should read it like that in order to enjoy it.
advantages.qual: My mother tongue is Albanian and I feel Italian as my second Language maybe because of the short distance between our countries. Regarding English I am studying it at university because I want to be an English teacher.
idealfuture.qual: I think English will have the most important role in my life. I am trying hard in learning it so in the future I can become able to help others learn it to.

mot.qual: My main motivation is my love for this language: I love its sound, its grammar, the possibilities that offers me and the culture behind it.
advantages.qual: The opportunity to reach a level of excellence toward this language
idealfuture.qual: NA
other.speak.other.L2: Just a little bit of french

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: I want to study English for several reasons, but mainly because I really love the language and I hope to live in a English-speaking country someday, in my future. The knowledge of this language will also prove to be quite useful in my future career, I suppose.
advantages.qual: Learning English at university level allows a deeper knowledge of the language, which is, in my opinion, not taught well enough/not given the right importance in previous levels.
idealfuture.qual: I'm sure English will be quite useful in both my job and personal life; it allows the speaker to communicate with the whole world, and thus freeing us from language barriers.

mot.qual:
I consider English to be the most valuable language in terms of mediation and I've always found myself enjoying real-life and virtual environments in which the language used was, in fact, English. 
With my language of focus being Japanese, i also consider English to be an important mediation tool in terms of working as a professional translator.
advantages.qual: I always thought knowing a romance language was of no help when learning english, since the structural origins of the two languages are historically different.
idealfuture.qual: When thinking about my future i picture myself as a translator working for a big company such as Nintendo, or a professional parliament interpreter. Both of which require a constant use of English.
other.speak.other.L2: some Spanish and I'm currently learning Japanese

mot.qual: I think the main motivation is that I want to work in the US. If I want to go and live there I really need good skills in this language. Moreover English has always been my favoufite language and I find it very interesting, which really motivates me to study it even more.
advantages.qual: I don't really know. I think that knowing English is important because Italian is not a very known language, but I don't know what other advantages could be.
idealfuture.qual: I'd like to be an Italian teacher in the US, so I'll need English in the everyday life. English, as Italian, will have a very important role in my future.

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: I want to become an English teacher, because I find it fun and very rewarding. Also because it allows me to meet people around the world.
advantages.qual: It gives me a broader understanding of English as a language, culture and system.
idealfuture.qual: It will be one of my jobs.

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual:
I love languages in general and above all English: I love English idioms and especially its culture.
Moreover, I love English because it gives me the opportunity to connect myself with many different countries and different cultures, so with the entire world.
I know that I've written not just one motivation, but I can't really choose one of them only.
advantages.qual: Studying English at University deepens my knowledge of this language, as I don't want only to be able to interact with other people in English when I ought to, but I want English to be a huge part of my professional future. At my university, indeed, I'm not just studying "pragmatical" English, but accurate grammar and literature.
idealfuture.qual: As I said before, I hope to use English very often.

mot.qual: Studio inglese perché, oltre ad affascinarmi molto,  lo ritengo indispensabile per poter viaggiare, comunicare con il resto del mondo e allargare gli orizzonti lavorativi.
advantages.qual: It gives me the possibility to learn to speak and read at high level in another languages, undestrood by everyone
idealfuture.qual: English can make me be able to work in an international level

mot.qual: I love the language and I hope someday I am gonna be able to use it not only for my job, but in every day life
advantages.qual: Italian is not one of the most studied languages abroad, so studying English will allow me to work and get in contact with people from all over the world
idealfuture.qual: A very important role as I am planning to work in a English-speaking country

mot.qual: Diventare cittadino del mondo e trovare lavoro
advantages.qual: Trovare lavoro più facilmente
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: NA

mot.qual: NA

mot.qual: English is fondamental to reach a high job position and it is really useful to communicate to other people all over the world but at the same time I thing that knowing English is not enough. In my opinion, the more languages you know, the more powerful you become because you are able to deal with every sort of situation on your own, without asking for help from other people. It is really important to me to became as much independent as I can
advantages.qual: I keep on improving my skills and I keep discovering new topics that o have never studied in a satisfying way
idealfuture.qual: I hope I will use English for my future job as well as polish (the other language that I am studying now)

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual:
When it was introduced to me for the first time, in junior high school, I found the English language fascinating and I was excited to learn more. After a Summer trip to a relative who lived in England my fascination with English increased and never stopped. 
I like how I can communicate with my foreign friends and how we can understand each other. My main motivation is that simple, English enable me to communicate with other people all over the world.
advantages.qual: Improving my English skills, becoming more fluent and trying hard to surpass my own limits.
idealfuture.qual: I think English will have an important role because I want to travel and if it's possible to find a job outside Italy. English will be always important.

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: Mi è sempre piaciuto l'inglese, fin da quando ero piccola, ed è stata una passione che è cresciuta con il tempo. Durante le medie la mia professoressa di inglese mi ha fatto amare la lingua e poi ho continuato a studiarla negli anni.
advantages.qual: Conoscere l' inglese può aiutare durante la ricerca di lavoro e quindi avere una laurea in questa lingua sarà di aiuto.In più ho un livello di inglese buono, ma non perfetto, quindi spero di arrivare a un livello di coscienza della lingua molto alto in questi tre anni.
idealfuture.qual: Finita l'Università vorrei trovare lavoro come traduttrice o comunque in un ambito correlato all'editoria, quindi penso che l'inglese mi sarà utile. Inoltre, mi piacerebbe fare un master o un esperienza lavorativa in un paese anglofono.

mot.qual: I'm studying English because I've always been keen on it and, in the future, I would like to work abroad, possibly in an English speaking country.
advantages.qual: English at university level is higher than English at high school level, especially because in the high school I studied scientific subjects and the english lessons were only two hours a week, so I didn't have an actual possibility to improve my English as I wanted to do.
idealfuture.qual: My dream is working in the UK, so English will play a main role in my life, that's why I want to improve it. I'm very glad to have this possibility at university and I've promised to myself to seize this opportunity.

mot.qual: I'd really like to become an interpreter
advantages.qual: I'm not actually sure whether it will give me an advantage at university level or not but I study English as I really really love it. Maybe the advantages can be that my level will be clearly recognized and stated on my CV.
idealfuture.qual: English will surely be part of my everyday life, even more than it already is. If my dreams come true, I will be speaking English everyday, possibly with my family and friends too.
other.speak.other.L2: Quite good French and a bit of Spanish

mot.qual: I've always loved english. I've been studying it since primary school and I've never wished to stop. Also, I want literature to be the main focus of my academic carrer, and studying english allow me to study a great variety of authors.   I see English as a way to be able to connect with many people and cultures, I believe it's a very important part of one's education but most importantly, I study it because I'm passionate about it.
advantages.qual: Having a good English level is highly requested in many areas , so maybe it could be helpful in finding a job. In my opinion, it also leaves other options open, such as moving abroad or eventually chosing an international master programme.
idealfuture.qual: I honestly don't know yet what I want my future to be. Ideally, I'd like to work in the publishing industry and I'd want english to be an important part of my job.

mot.qual: I study English because I want to become a teacher but I also think that is important to know as many language as possible.
advantages.qual: I hope that the learning of English will help me to find a job.
idealfuture.qual: I like very much thinking of me as a teacher of English literature in the future.
study.other.L2: I also study French at university level.

mot.qual: I need to use English for my job
advantages.qual:
l'italiano, essendo una lingua molto più complessa, permette di apprendere più velocemente una lingua relativamente semplice come l'inglese.
L'inglese al giorno d'oggi è richiesto ovunque
idealfuture.qual: Parte fondamentale del mio lavoro

mot.qual: My main motivation for studying English is that I consider it as one of the most beautiful languages in the world, and also one of the most important. I study English because I like the culture of English-speaking countries and because I imagine my future in one of those countries.
advantages.qual: I think that the possibility of knowing English at university level will improve my chances of finding a job abroad, and together with my ability to speak Italian, it will develop my learning skills.
idealfuture.qual: According to my plans English will have a fundamental role.

mot.qual: I think that English is very important and I really love using this language as it's fascinating.
advantages.qual: I can't think of many advantages, but I believe that I'm studying really hard and I will become an excelent English-speaker.
idealfuture.qual: I would like to live in an English-spoken country, where I can use my skills everyday.

mot.qual: I suppose it's probably the culture directly or indirectly related to English. The books, the films, the plays, the media, the translations... Many interesting cultural aspects are realized in English, so I wish to be able to discover and to understand them as best as possible.
advantages.qual: I think one of them is that it offers you a deeper approach to the language as itself, and not just as a tool to speak or write in a foreign country. In Italy, I feel like that until high school English, like probably any other language, is thought in a way which makes you able to communicate correctly in a grammatical/lexical level, which is completely fine in order to live and to survive in a globalized world. At the university, on the other hand, you can approach the language as a "manifestation" of the culture and, so, to learn the way of thinking of English native speakers, making you feel part of it and just a "simple" user.
idealfuture.qual: I'm not sure, but I can imagine myself having to communicate in English just as I am now doing in Italian, and perhaps even more. I don't know what my future is exactly going to be, but I can safely say that English is going to be an important part of it. After all, that's one of the reason why I'm studying it now.

mot.qual:
My dream is to live in England, probably because people I admire live or were born in England or in English-speaking countries in general. Since I was a child I always wanted to become a tourist guide in London, because I love the culture, the city and the history of England, but growing up I started thinking about myself as a writer, not because I think I can become a worlwide famous writer, but because I love writing down my ideas, my feelings and emotions and to trasform them in a story. 
What I always believed is that if I can speak and write good in English my possibilities to realise my dreams are more and more everyday.
advantages.qual:
Italian is a language spoken only in Italy, but English is the language of the world, everyone can speak English, even if at different levels, so if I can speak it pretty well I can relate to people form all over the world and the more I know it, the more I can realte to different levels of speaking, and also in different subjects. 
With an English at university level I have more possibility to speak and relate, so probably I will also have more possibilities in the future to find a better job.
idealfuture.qual: I hope that one day I will move to an English-speaking country, possibly in England, because since I was a child that was my dream, but now that I grew up I hope that in my future I will have a good job for which I can travel a lot around the world, and for this reason it's important to be able to speak at least English very well.

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: I am interested in studying foreign languages. English is the first foreign language that we study at school, from the age of six, and it is inevitable the fact that we study it. Anyway it is a pleasure to me to study English because I like the Anglo-Saxon culture, and this is not a matter of job opportunities. I am interested in studying the way of life of anglo-saxon people and test it on my skin. I am fascinated by Anglo-Saxons and their language.
advantages.qual: I think that to learn a language we have to carry forward the study of it until we die because it is a study that never ends. There will be anytime something to learn and, as a consequence, the study of English at university is an obligatory step.
idealfuture.qual: Nowadays English is the lingua franca for people from everywhere, I don't know if in the future will be the same but I am sure that English will play an important role anyway. I believe that English will be necessary for me to work as it is for most italian people.

mot.qual: WHEN I'M STUDING ENGLISH I CAN'T REALIZE TIME IS FLOWING ,I THINK THAT'S JUST BECAUSE I'M REALLY INTESTERED IN IT.  THAT'S MY MAIN MOTIVATION,I THINK , IN ADDITION TO ALL THE OTHER POSSIBLE ADVANTANGES IT MAY BRING IN THE FUTURE.
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: I like the idea of getting a wider knowledge of the anlosaxon culture and literature. I have always loved learning and speaking English as I believe it is the best means of communication with people from all over the world. Thanks to my knowledge of English I have made many friends from different countries and I find it useful every day.
advantages.qual: Learning English at university level will allow me to get a higher qualification of knowledge, granting me better chances of working in a field I am interested in and getting a good job besides widening my culture.
idealfuture.qual: Hopefully, it will either become my first language (as I hope I will be able to live and work abroad in an anglosaxon country) or at least a fundamental part of my job.

mot.qual: I do believe that learning English will give me the chance to travel the world and to meet new cultures, but also new people.
advantages.qual: Studying English at university level gives me the opportunity to meet foreign students from all over the world, to have more competent professors and to speak with other students that share with me the same interests.
idealfuture.qual: I really hope that English will be part of my future job, but what I hope the most is that English will allow me to travel a lot.
other.speak.other.L2: French and a bit of German.

mot.qual: My main motivation for studying English is that I would like to be able to master it one day, both orally and writtenly.
advantages.qual: The main advantages for me of learning English at university level are that I get to know well two languages and that I discover a brand new side of the English language: it is not about basic grammar anymore, but Funcional Grammar, which is, to me, a completely new way of seeing the English language.
idealfuture.qual: English will be a big part of my job. This includes the fact that I may be able to work abroad, maybe in an English - speaking  country.

mot.qual: Because I like it as a language, but also I love the culture, lifestyle and thought of the countries where english is spoken, so I want to learn something which I'm interested in and which can be useful for my future job and also for traveling, which is one of my "hobbies".
advantages.qual: Well, first of all the main advantage is the fact that speaking and understanding English is useful because you can find a job more easily, even abroad. Then, there is the possibility to meet people from all over the world, widen your horizons, your knowledge and your experience, and in my opinion this is one of the best things you have to do in your life.
idealfuture.qual: I'm not very sure but I'd like to work abroad for certain periods, not only in countries where english is spoken, so it would be necessary to know that language.. so it will be part of my life and career.
other.speak.other.L2: I also speak Spanish (I have a level A2 more or less).

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: I study English because I want to learn to communicate with people of other countries and because I want to find a job abroad.
advantages.qual: I hope that studying English at university level will allows me to get a high level of preparation and a more chances to find a job.
idealfuture.qual: In the future an high level of spoken English will be important to find a good job.
other.speak.other.L2: I can speak Spanish very good and I have studied French for five years.

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: Explore the world
advantages.qual: I'm Iranian and English in the very first place helped in Italy when I was completely new here
idealfuture.qual: When I am working a good job for sure I see my self using a high level of English

mot.qual: I would like to find a job that allows me to travel, because I want to know new cultures.
advantages.qual: I hope to manage to speak English very well because I think it will help to find a good job and communicate with people from almost every country in the world
idealfuture.qual: Probabily I will need it every day to communicate

mot.qual: My motivation is that English is one of the most spoken languages in the world, so it's important being able to speak/read/listen to it. Moreover I love learning new languages and I love being able to communicate n English with other people.
advantages.qual: I  don't think there are many advantages because I think that it doesn't matter which is your mother tongue if you want to learn a new language. The only thing that matter is your determination
idealfuture.qual: When I think about my future, it always involves English as I hope to get a job in a foreign country.

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: I've been studying English since I was 12. English is probably the most important part of my life. It is the only subject where I know I am the best. I need English to feel comfortable with myself.
advantages.qual: Travelling.
idealfuture.qual: I want to live in Canada, to work there.

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: Being able to travel around the world and speak with a lot of people is something worth the effort. And I think that by learning English I will able to do so
advantages.qual: The main advantage is the Italian language itself. It is true that Italian is a language with a certain status but is also true that is not so widely spoken. Getting a degree in English will certify that I can use English at a certain level. So being native speaker of Italian plus having a degree in English will open me a lot of doors, specially in the translation field.
idealfuture.qual: I imagine my self using English everyday to work and also in the everyday life

mot.qual: I like how this language sounds and I think it is useful to people who want to become more aware and active on a global dimension.
advantages.qual: Learning to speak properly and fluently a language that can open me to a wide range of possibilities all around the world.
idealfuture.qual: It helps me interact with people from different cultures and allows me to listen effectively to people necessities.

mot.qual:
Because it is the Language of my favourite authors and I feel a certain link with its culture. I hope to acquire in the not so distant future the proficiency and the fluidity necessary to live and have a good job in a English-speaking country.
 I decided to study English also because I strongly believe that one one day soon I'll be able to use it as it were my mothertongue, whereas I can't imagine myself really being able to speak or write fluently languages too distant from my mindset, traditions and values (e.g. Arabic, Chinese, Japanese).
advantages.qual: Learning English at university level will give me the means to really express my thoughts in this Language, not a roughly translated version of them. This will allow me to include wit and elegance to my speaking and writing, to communicate with English-speaking people as I would with Italian-speaking people.
idealfuture.qual:
I would love to be a translator for cinema, television or a publishing house, but I am aware this is likely to remain only a dream.
After university I can imagine myself living and working in an English-speaking country for a couple of years or more.
study.other.L2: I'm studying German. Since I've never studied it before, I a beginner.

mot.qual: The main one is that Iove this language and so far I've become quite good at it. Also, I find amazing that a good level of English allows you to truly communicate with people who otherwise you couldn't talk to, and by communicating I mean something more and deeper that just a "Hi, how are you?" "Fine, thanks".
advantages.qual: I guess and hope that studying English at university level should make me able to use this language as a native speaker, which means that at the end of this path I should be able to speak a real "everyday life" English (so something way different than what I've learnt at high school), but I should also be able to switch to a formal and "more professional" English with no problems at all.
idealfuture.qual: I see myself in an international cooperation context in which the more languages I know, the more I will be able to do my job in the best and more efficient way, so not only English is gonna be important, but als every other languages I'll manage to speak, including Italian.

mot.qual: I really want to improve my English and to have a good knowledge of the language because I really enjoy learning it and I would love to use it in the future (career, life, travels...)
advantages.qual:
To improve the level of English
To learn how to use the language in different contexts and situations (informal/more formal, everyday life/working environment...)
idealfuture.qual: Central role in my career

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: I would like to master the language enough to be able to work in English-speaking Countries. Moreover, having good English skills will help me to find a better job in my Country as well.
advantages.qual: It will be useful when I'll have a job and it will allow me to live in an English-speaking Country
idealfuture.qual: Possibly one of the mains ones. If I will be living abroad, I will be using it every day.

mot.qual: English allows me to speak with people of many countries
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: I don't know

mot.qual: English is one of the most used languages in the world
advantages.qual: You can use it in a future job and to speak to foreign people
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: I love English. I like talking in English with other people, even if they are not native speakers. And it gives me satisfaction understanding what someone says in English. I like studying its grammar too, I don't think it is tedious, I see it as a group of rules which allows me to master the language. For me, English is a kind of passion.
advantages.qual: I would love to master the language in a good way, as best as it is possible. I hope university gives me the opportunity to reach this aim. Choosing one university subject instead of another means focusing on that subject. So, the main advantage of learning English at university level is to focus mainly on the Language, trying to learning more about it - and in a more detailed way.
idealfuture.qual:
Often I imagine myself as a teacher in the future. In that case, my entire job will be English. 
Sometimes, instead, I think it could be beautiful to become a guide for tourists, hopefully in Italy. In that case, I would love to show italian beautiful places or art masterpieces to foreign tourists; So English would be a mean to express my love for my country and to show others something I love. It would be a wonderful way to speak English, which, as I said before, is an activity I really love doing.

mot.qual: I like how it sounds
advantages.qual: University level of English helps find better job than a normal level.
idealfuture.qual: I wish I could live in Australia, so English will have a priority role.

mot.qual: My main motivation is to learn a second language that I can use in the same way as Italian.
advantages.qual: It's easier to be understood by people who don't speak your language, even non-English speakers. It is a global language and I need to learn it the best I can, so I can have a lot more opportunities.
idealfuture.qual: I hope I will have to use English a lot because this means that I will have reached my goal. I want a job where my studies are not only useful, but necessary.

mot.qual: Principalmente per una comprensione della letteratura più profonda.
advantages.qual: A livello universitario lo studio è più profondo e ci sono più libri o fonti da cui attingere.
idealfuture.qual: Io vedo l'inglese come un mezzo di comunicazione interpersonale più esteso.

mot.qual: I could interact with people from other parts of the world.
advantages.qual: In this way I could improve my English.
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: Avere più possibilità di lavorare all'estero.
advantages.qual: Riuscire a comunicare con persone straniere, le quali raramente parlano italiano e invece l'inglese quasi sempre.
idealfuture.qual: Probabilmente un ruolo protagonista, nel lavoro o nella vita quotidiana.

mot.qual: Perché mi dà la possibilità di comprendere più persone possibili.
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: Nel mio futuro l'inglese ha il ruolo di darmi la possibilità di viaggiare e comunicare con gente di molte culture.

mot.qual: I study English because I'm going to find a job outside Italy.
advantages.qual: Voglio migliorare le mie capacità linguistiche e arrivare ad una certa padronanza della lingua inglese.
idealfuture.qual: Spero che mi dia la possibilità di fare un lavoro che porti anche a piccole soddisfazioni e ad un buon stipendio.

mot.qual: The main motivation of studying English is that it is a language that most of foreign people do understand and speak so it's easier to communicate with them.
advantages.qual: If you are studying english at the university means that your english level is quite high already, because the tasks given by the university are hard for a newcomer english speaker. As a consequence I think that studying english at the university is useful to lower the workload on another language.
idealfuture.qual: English in the future is going to play a key role in everyone's life, whatever you like it or not. Everything is going to be in english I think, starting from the medias to everyday's life.
other.speak.other.L2: Tedesco, francese, spagnolo, russo e ungherese / German, french, spanish, russian and hungarian.

mot.qual: I think it is really important and I really like it.
advantages.qual: It permits me to use it in my life and maybe it can be useful for a job.
idealfuture.qual: I think it will be fundamental in my life, for my job for example.

mot.qual: I think it's one of the most important languages of the world and it's important to know it. Furthermore, my mother and my aunts are English, but they didn't teach it to me.
advantages.qual: I will have a degree in English and I think it's quite fundamental for searching for job in the future.
idealfuture.qual: It would be my job.
origins.specify: My mother and my aunts are from Manchester in England (but my grandparents are Italian).

mot.qual: To get access to an international system of communication.
advantages.qual: I am used to the study of literature.
idealfuture.qual: Key language for my business (work, travelling).

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: I like very much the language and using it, and also some aspects of literature that I'd like more to study in the original language rather than with tradutions.
advantages.qual: I hope I will become a master in using English.
idealfuture.qual: To be honest, I really do not know.

mot.qual: Having a global education.
advantages.qual: Learning a different grammar approach.
idealfuture.qual: Important for my job.

mot.qual: I'd like to work and travel abroad.
advantages.qual: I can improve it in a better way.
idealfuture.qual: I hope it can be useful for the work.

mot.qual: Mi piace la letteratura inglese
advantages.qual: La possibilità di conoscere le strutture più particolari della lingua.
idealfuture.qual: Spero di trasferirmi in un paese anglofono.

mot.qual: Mi piace l'inglese e ritengo che possa essere utile per il futuro.
advantages.qual: Posso studiarlo in modo più approfondito.
idealfuture.qual: Spero che l'inglese abbia un ruolo importante nel mio futuro, non solo lavorativo ma forse anche personale.

mot.qual: Mi piace l'inglese quindi lo studio.
advantages.qual: Posso capire più cose e parlare con più persone.
idealfuture.qual: Non lo so.
other.speak.other.L2: Italiano e un po' di giapponese.
study.other.L2: Spagnolo e un po' di giapponese

mot.qual: Improving my English will help me interact with people from all over the world, discover new cultures and lifestyles and be a part of a wider world.
advantages.qual: I think the main advantage of learning the language at a university level is the deeper and more precise approach and also the fact that the study of laguage comes together with the study of literature.
idealfuture.qual: It will help me find a job abroad, make me able to interact with people from anywhere in the world and travel a lot.

mot.qual: Studio inglese perché mi piace saperne di più della cultura anglofona e mi piacerebbe avere un'esperienza lavorativa in America.
advantages.qual: Migliorare la lingua e anche assodare la cultura inglese.
idealfuture.qual: Magari potrei diventare un insegnante di inglese o lavorare per ditte import-export.

mot.qual: I imagine myself working abroad in the future. In this perspective I think speaking english would be a must. Also, if I didn't get the job of y dreams, I could still teach english here in Italy or abroad.
advantages.qual: Mainly having more possibilities to get a job in the future and interact with people from other cultures and countries, being english a universally spoken language.
idealfuture.qual: I think it will be the language I'll use on daily basis.

mot.qual: I want to improve my English in order to being able in the future to use it also in job.
idealfuture.qual: A lot.

mot.qual: Because I really enjoy speaking in English and I'd like to improve my English.
advantages.qual: I think that an advanced knowledge of English will make me able to get a better job
idealfuture.qual: I think that it will have an important role in my life

mot.qual: The main motivation is that I have always appreciated English and from it began my passion for languages.
advantages.qual: It would help me to take up a high level career and to communicate abroad.
idealfuture.qual: Part of my job, maybe of my life.

mot.qual: English has always been my favourite language out of those I studied and I will keep on studying it because I enjoy doing it and I learn something new every day.
advantages.qual: I think the vast majority of Italians know English to a certain level, I think studying it at university level will bring me further.
idealfuture.qual: I hope I will be able to use English as much as possible in the future, wether it's written English or spoken English it doesn't matter, I just want to see if all my efforts were worth it.

mot.qual: I would like to spend a period in USA and being able to speak english well will help me.
advantages.qual: Well, Italian is of course more complex than English, to learn Italian you need to study a lot of grammar while the best way to improve your proficiency in English is to listen to it and to speak it.
idealfuture.qual: I hope it will be part of my future job. I would like to be an high school teacher or a tourist guide, that's all

mot.qual: I really enjoy studying foreign languages and I discovered it by studying English. Moreover, it is considered the most important language to know to be part of a globalised world.
advantages.qual: I think it could help me to learn the language at a higher level than most of Italians who only study it at school and that nowadays that can make the difference in the job world.
idealfuture.qual: I hope it will be a significant aspect in my future job, or maybe the main language I will speak if I'm going to live abroad.
other.speak.other.L2: French and a bit of German

mot.qual: Find a job that involves the use of English
advantages.qual: I was well teached in high school
idealfuture.qual: I really hope it will be the main tool that I'll use in my job

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: I love the language: how it sounds, how it developed through the centuries, it's relevance today. I love England and U.S.A., and I'm sure I'd like Australia too, and Canada, if I'll ever have the opportunity to go there.
advantages.qual: Maybe the grammar is easier.
idealfuture.qual: Medium

mot.qual: My main motivation for studying English is because I like learning other languages in general and English is the one I feel most connected to.
advantages.qual: I am able to learn aspects of this language more in deptht, especially grammar and master my speaking and writing abilities.
idealfuture.qual: One day I would like to live abroad in the UK (Scotland I think) and English would be important for both my job and daily life.

mot.qual: I really hope to adquire a high level of spoken English because I believe it will help me a lot in my future.
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: I would like to work abroad so I'm sure English will be fundamental for me.
other.speak.other.L2: French, Spanish and a little of Chinese

mot.qual: I want to learn it in order to be able to communicate fluently in English (I hope that my future job will involve English).
advantages.qual: I think it's a huge possibility given to us. At university we can improve our English by learning more and more words, and by studying in a deeper way things already done at high school.
idealfuture.qual: I want to find a job where I can always challenge myself. Perhaps by connecting with other countries, so I will have to use English in order to understand and make me understand.

mot.qual: I study English because nowadays it is essential to travel around the word and to do any job. Moreover in Italy there are many tourists and English is useful to communicate with them. I am not sure what I'm going to do after graduating but I want to work with languages and English is the basis because it is the universal language.
advantages.qual: If I study English at university level I will be able to teach it in future or to became and interpreter or a translator.
idealfuture.qual: I am sure I will use English in my future: maybe because I decide to live in an anglosaxon's country or becuase I want to teach it in Italy. English is fundamental if you want to work with languages in your future.

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: A good job
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: It will be a key in my carrier because I want to be a translator.

mot.qual: Well,I consider myself as a citizen of the world: one of the main aspects of my life is "communication"  and,of course,if you want to communicate,you are owed to use language,different languages. And if you want to communicate all over the world? You can't learn the language of each country. So,I though "what it the language most spread,which can make me able to talk with anyone else? English!" and then I chose it.
advantages.qual: For us Italians,english is quite simple: we can learn to write it in a correct form,to read book of english/american/canadian literature in the original language and to be able to express ourselves in conversations. I hope it.
idealfuture.qual:
It can make me able to travel all over the world and to be understood in each part of the planet. 
It can also be useful for any kind of work I'll do.

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: I have always found easy learning and studying languages in general, it attracts me, it challenges me. But English has that aspect (maybe the culture, the extreme beauty of England or the "American dream" for a foreigner) that makes the difference. I love learning and speaking English and I find that it fits me more than other subjects or other potential degrees.
advantages.qual: We are speaking of two completely different languages with different origins. They have nothing in common and this is an advantage from my point of view. When you learn a language completely different from yours, you start understanding how the system of languages works and you'll find easier, next time, learning another one (Arabic, Russian, Chinese). Moreover, doing it at a university level is not a scholastic type of education, it becomes a part of you as a human being, of your cultural background. It opens your mind.
idealfuture.qual: I like to think of myself as a worker in the international scene or in the media sector. Something that must involve international information and communication. English is a fundamental part of my job.

mot.qual: I am studying English because I really like the sound of this language and I think this will be useful for my future
advantages.qual: I think that English symbolizes future and progress so it is important that everyone knows it
idealfuture.qual: I hope that English will have a main role in my future life

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA

mot.qual: I have always loved learning English and I hope to improve it through my studies, but I am also interested in the different cultures of Anglophonic Nations. I am also rather convinced that nowadays, a good knowledge of this language will help me reach to many different people from around the world, and therefore to a variety of cultures, being English a sort of International language.
advantages.qual: As said before, I believe English to be a great way to connect to foreign people, as it is widely spoken worldwide, while Italian, on the other side, is much less spoken outside of Italy.
idealfuture.qual: My dream in the future is to move to an Anglophonic nation, so I will need to speak English on a daily basis.
other.speak.other.L2: I have studied German and French in high-school

mot.qual: NA
advantages.qual: NA
idealfuture.qual: NA
